neighbours

Interface IStringMeasure

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JaccardNgramMeasure

    public interface IStringMeasure
    A measure to calculate the distant between two strings

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getDistance(java.lang.String s1, java.lang.String s2)
      Calculates the real distant between two strings
      boolean inFilter(java.lang.String s1, java.lang.String s2, double minDist)
      A fast filter which allows to preselect combination which satisfy a maximum distant.

    • Method Detail

      • inFilter

        boolean inFilter(java.lang.String s1,
                 java.lang.String s2,
                 double minDist)
        A fast filter which allows to preselect combination which satisfy a maximum distant.
        Parameters:
        s1 - first string
        s2 - second string
        minDist - a maximum distant
        Returns:
        true if the strings will have a lower distant than minDist

      • getDistance

        double getDistance(java.lang.String s1,
                   java.lang.String s2)
        Calculates the real distant between two strings
        Parameters:
        s1 - first string
        s2 - second string
        Returns:
        the distant between s1 and s2
